title: Mean-Field Analysis and Optimal Control of a Dynamic Rating and Matchmaking System
summary: Large-scale competitive platforms are interacting multi-agent systems in which latent skills drift over time and pairwise interactions are shaped by matchmaking. We study a controlled rating dynamics in the mean-field limit and derive a kinetic description for the joint evolution of skills and ratings.
